entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
